text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. – Albert Einstein. Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are. – Chinese Proverb.
Rest and self-care are so important. – Audre Lorde. You can’t pour from an empty cup. Take care of yourself first.
Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles. – Charlie Chaplin. Feelings are just visitors, let them come and go.
